parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Difficulty

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Forces <tt>showCadetHints</tt> and <tt>showCadetWP</tt> global Cadet [[Arma 3: Difficulty Settings|<template><title>arma3</title></template> difficulty]], returns previous settings.

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[forceCadetDifficulty]] [showCadetHints, showCadetWP]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> showCadetHints: [[Boolean]] - <tt>showCadetHints</tt> difficulty

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> showCadetWP: [[Boolean]] - <tt>showCadetWP</tt> difficulty

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Boolean]]s - [prev_showCadetHints, prev_showCadetWP]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _previousSettings = [[forceCadetDifficulty]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[true]], [[false]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _fnc_forceCadetDifficulty = 
{
	[[params]] ["_OKButtonPressed"];
	[[if]] (_OKButtonPressed) [[then]]
	{
		[[forceCadetDifficulty]] ([[switch]] ([[toLowerANSI]] [[configName]] (([[configFile]] >> "CfgDifficultyPresets") [[select]] [[difficulty]])) [[do]]
		{
			[[case]] "recruit";
			[[case]] "regular":
			{
				// showCadetHints = 1;
				// showCadetWP = 1;
				<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[true]], [[true]]]
			};
			[[case]] "veteran":
			{
				// showCadetHints = 0;
				// showCadetWP = 1;
				<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[false]], [[true]]]
			};
			[[default]]
			{
				// showCadetHints = 0;
				// showCadetWP = 0;
				<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[false]], [[false]]]
			};
		});
	};
};
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[true]]] [[call]] _fnc_forceCadetDifficulty;
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[missionNamespace]], "OnGameOptionsExited", _fnc_forceCadetDifficulty] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_addScriptedEventHandler]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[difficulty]], [[cadetMode]], [[hintCadet]], [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers/ScriptedEventHandlers|Arma 3 Scripted Event Handlers]]
</value></part></template></root>
